document_data.mainbody:
'''''Hillsfar Reclaimed''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Rage of Demons|Rage of Demons]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Hillsfar]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters. It is Part One of ''Six Knives for Torin Nomerthal''.

{{Quote|''The time has come to fight back against Hillsfar. Elanil Elassidil tasks you with uncovering valuable information to be used in a strike against the leader of Hillsfar, First Lord Torin Nomerthal himself. The only problem is that what you need is protected within the walls of the city.''|}}
